azurerm_data_factory_trigger_schedule.description: Manages a Trigger Schedule inside a Azure Data Factory.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Factory Schedule Trigger. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique. See the [Microsoft documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/naming-rules

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Factory Schedule Trigger. Changing this forces a new resource

data_factory_name.description: The Data Factory name in which to associate the Schedule Trigger with. Changing this forces a new resource.

pipeline_name.description: The Data Factory Pipeline name that the trigger will act on.

start_time.description: The time the Schedule Trigger will start. This defaults to the current time. The time will be represented in UTC.

end_time.description: The time the Schedule Trigger should end. The time will be represented in UTC.

interval.description: The interval for how often the trigger occurs. This defaults to 1.

frequency.description: The trigger freqency. Valid values include `Minute`, `Hour`, `Day`, `Week`, `Month`. Defaults to `Minute`.

pipeline_parameters.description: The pipeline parameters that the trigger will act upon.

annotations.description: List of tags that can be used for describing the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.

id.description: The ID of the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Factory Schedule Trigger.
